attributes.action: I won't the  government to show the public what they spend there wages on
attributes.additional_details: Tax payers pay your wages we should know were the money is going
attributes.background: If people on pip have to tell the government what they use there pip for I think it's only right that the government shows the public what they spend there wages on as the tax payer pays there wages

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about MP's wages, but we do not know how you wish the government to show what they spend their wages on.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all MPs to publish their tax returns by law
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716393
